name: Aero Club Brugge
about: Aero Club Brugge is a reputable flying school located in Ursel, Belgium, offering comprehensive aviation training. With a focus on both recreational and professional pilot training, the club provides a range of courses including Private Pilot Licences (PPL) and Commercial Pilot Licences (CPL). Our experienced instructors are dedicated to ensuring students receive high-quality theoretical and practical training. The club's fleet is well-maintained, and our commitment to safety is paramount. Whether you are flying for pleasure or pursuing a career in aviation, Aero Club Brugge is a trusted choice for your flight training needs. We are dedicated to helping you achieve your flying goals in a safe and supportive environment.
